title: Travel and Tourism 1
sentences: I would like to reserve a room.
Do you have a single room available?
We need a double room with a bath.
Where can I print my flight ticket?
My suitcase got lost at the airport.
What is your favorite travel destination?
I book my vacation at the travel agency.
Our flight takes about three hours.
When is the departure to London?
Der Zug hat leider eine Stunde
The train unfortunately has a one-hour delay.
Here is your boarding pass for the flight.
There are many travelers at the station.
Brauche ich für dieses Land ein
Do you need a visa for this country?
I have to open my suitcases at customs.
Tomorrow we are going on a trip to the mountains.
We are visiting the sights today.
Do you have a city map of Berlin?
The tour guide explains the history to us.
Our accommodation is clean and central.
How much does an overnight stay in the hotel cost?
Is dinner included in the price?
Breakfast is served from seven o'clock.
I prefer full board for the vacation.
I am writing a postcard to my family.
I am buying a small souvenir for you.
We are looking forward to the return home.
dictionary:
reservieren - to reserve / book
das Einzelzimmer - single room
das Doppelzimmer - double room
der Reisepass - passport
das Flugticket - flight ticket
der Koffer - suitcase
das Reiseziel - travel destination
das Reisebüro - travel agency
der Flughafen - airport
der Flug - flight
die Landung - landing
der Abflug - departure (flight)
die Verspätung - delay
die Bordkarte - boarding pass
der Reisende (Pl. die Reisenden) - traveler
das Visum - visa
der Zoll - customs
der Ausflug - excursion / trip
die Sehenswürdigkeit (Pl. die Sehenswürdigkeiten) - sight / attraction
der Stadtplan - city map
der Reiseleiter - tour guide
die Unterkunft - accommodation
die Übernachtung - overnight stay
inklusive - included
das Frühstück - breakfast
die Halbpension - half board
die Vollpension - full board
die Postkarte - postcard
das Souvenir - souvenir
die Rückkehr - return
